name: Assassin's Creed Tumblr Post Icons !
description:
Changes the Text/Photo/Quote/Link/Chat/Audio/Video icons to various Assassin's Creed Insignias, while keeping the designated colors of each respected post type.
http://hisako87.tumblr.com/
additional_info: Update History: 2015 June 16 - reuploaded here, to original account. #83998 had 2,111 installs at time of deletion. 2015 April 2 - fixes to #83998 2013 March 5 - fixes, uploaded to new account (forgot how to login here). Style ID #83998 2012 September 9 - created
